participant_1.background:
I am a patient with a chronic illness, but I try to make the most of my life by donating time and money to charity.
i love to snack between meals.
I'm looking forward to starting a new life in a new state with my dog.
i like to make cellphone apps that would help heal our world.
I check in with my pup.

participant_2.background:
I have no children, but I love my pets very much.
I'm worried about how we're going to make ends meet on one income.
i love to run fast.
i play video games all day.
I am a person who is happy with my hobbies and I am not too concerned about what others think of me.

content.text: Hello. How is your day going?
Hey! My day is going well. I'm just playing some video games and relaxing. What about you?
My day is going well! I'm just hanging out with my dog, checking in on my friends and family, and donating some time to charity.
That sounds nice! I wish I had a dog. I love animals. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy. He's a great dog. He's really friendly and loves to play fetch.
Oh my gosh, golden retrievers are my favorite! They're so cute and fluffy.
He is! He's the best dog I could ask for.
I'm glad to hear that. I'm sure he's a great companion.
He is. He always makes me happy.
That's really nice. I'm glad you have him.
Thanks. I'm glad I do too.
What kind of charity do you donate time to?
I donate time to a local animal shelter. I love animals, so I like to help out where I can.
That's really great of you! I'm sure the animals appreciate it.
I hope so! I like to think I'm making a difference.
Thanks. I'm glad I could help.
